description: Business verification information required for text messaging compliance in the United States and Canada. This data registers your business with mobile carriers to enable SMS messaging capabilities. The verification process helps prevent spam and ensures your business messages are delivered reliably to customers.

entity_type.description: Legal form of the business. PRIVATE_PROFIT: Privately-held for-profit company (e.g., LLC, Corp). PUBLIC_PROFIT: Publicly-traded for-profit company. NON_PROFIT: Non-profit organization (e.g., 501(c)(3)). SOLE_PROPRIETOR: Individual business owner without formal business entity.

brand_name.description: Brand name of the company or DBA (Doing Business As)

street.description: Street address and number (e.g., "123 Main Street", "456 5th Avenue")

full_address.description: Complete formatted address including street, city, state, postal code, and country (e.g., "123 Main Street, New York, NY 10001, USA")

contact_phone.description: Contact phone number in E.164 format without + prefix

mobile_phone.description: Mobile phone number for brand verification in E.164 format without + prefix

example.full_address: 456 Market Street, San Francisco, CA 94105, USA
